A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was disappointed in quite a few things - Casting choices\, seemingly pointless or drawn out sub plots\, poor attempts at humor (in my opinion)\, development of minor characters\, etc. I was also concerned about what was happening with Luke for the first half of the movie. However\, ultimately I do believe there were a few powerful scenes that redeemed the film for me. I found the message about learning from failure to be especially poignant and well delivered. I am still very conflicted about what I saw and need to see it again. The film did not turn out the way I would have liked but I believe it is worth a watch (or two) and\, hopefully\, episode IX can help provide additional context to complete the new saga.
